resources.string: How do I use this page?

Log in or sign up to use this service. If you have previously created an account, please log in using the same username and password that you used to sign up. If you do not have an account, please contact your local food bank or food pantry to set up an account.
Select a food bank or pantry for a drive-by pickup, then press the button at the bottom of the screen to continue.
Select the food bag type that you would like to pick up, then press the button at the bottom of the screen to continue.
Select the date on which you would like to pick up your bag, then press the button at the bottom of the screen to continue.
Select the time of day at which you would like to pick up your bag, then press the button at the bottom of the screen to continue.
Confirm that the details of your order as displayed on this page are correct. Press the button at the bottom of the screen to place your order when you have verified your order details.
When picking up your order, hold your phone screen with this page showing next to your window. This will let the volunteers know which type of bag you ordered.

Log in or sign up to use this service. If your organization has previously created an account, please use your organization\'s existing username and password. If your organization does not have an account, please create one by selecting a sign-in method.
Select the food bank for which you would like to view a list of current orders.

This page lists all the current orders for your selected food bank. From this page, you can view existing orders, sort and filter them, and mark them completed. If you have an email address from your food bank or pantry (myemail\@myfoodbank.org for example) you can delete orders.
